name: Centralized Dashboard Monitoring
short: A centralized dashboard to collect, process, and visualize industrial data for decision-making.
long: Built a centralized dashboard to collect, process, and visualize industrial data, enabling managers to monitor KPIs and make informed decisions. Backend powered by PHP & MySQL with secure role-based access.

name: Billing Software
short: Billing system with invoice generation, tax calculation, and Razorpay integration.
long: Developed a multi-vertical billing management system with invoice generation, tax calculation, and customer record management. Integrated Razorpay payment gateway (COD/UPI) for seamless payments and enabled secure data storage. Built admin & user dashboards for billing analytics, revenue tracking, and compliance monitoring.

name: Order App
short: Order management app with QR ordering, subscriptions, and Razorpay integration.
long: Developed a multi-vertical order management system with QR-based ordering, subscription plans, and product management. Integrated Razorpay payment gateway (COD/UPI) and enabled real-time order tracking. Built admin & user dashboards for analytics, revenue reports, and subscription monitoring.

name: Property Site
short: Website for property search and listings with detailed views.
long: Designed a real-estate website with property listings, search filters, and detailed property views, supported by a secure backend. Includes admin panel for adding and updating properties.

name: Institution Site
short: Institutional website with courses, inquiries, and admin control.
long: Built a website for institutions to display courses, manage student inquiries, and update content through an admin panel. Backend built with PHP & MySQL for dynamic content management.

name: Franchise Site
short: Web solution for franchise businesses with registration and lead handling.
long: Developed a web solution for franchise businesses with registration forms, lead management, and centralized data handling. Secure backend with PHP & MySQL ensures smooth data flow.
